articles.title: Spatially resolved multiomics of human cardiac niches - Nature.com
articles.description: Single-cell and spatial transcriptomic analysis of eight human heart tissues reveals the cellular profiles and tissue architecture of niches including the cardiac conduction system, and a new tool, drug2cell, identifies drug target expression.

articles.title: PLSCR1 is a cell-autonomous defence factor against SARS-CoV-2 infection - Nature.com
articles.description: Phospholipid scramblase 1 (PLSCR1), a protein induced by IFNγ, acts as a defence factor against SARS-CoV-2 and other coronaviruses by inhibiting the fusion of the virus with host-cell membranes.
